sect1.title: Changing ownership
sect1.para: Now we're in chroot, it is time to change the ownership of the files and directories that were installed in chapter 5 to root. Run the following command to do so:
This command changes the ownership of the root partition to root. The command uses 0:0 instead of root:root, because the user name "root" can't be resolved, as glibc is not installed yet.
